content: welcome to krissy s over the mountain crochet transform your kitchen and bath with a touch of handmade elegance 1 easy to read crochet pattern 2 easy to find yarn it just takes scraps 3 easy to find supplies 4 video tutorial on how to crochet around that wooden ring use soft and durable cotton yarn for a beautiful towel holder the wooden ring adds a rustic touch making it a perfect blend of modern and classic easy closure learn the art of crocheting around a wooden ring and attach a button of your choice for a secure and stylish closure elevate your design by selecting unique buttons like sunflowers fruits or any theme that complements your kitchen or bath decor simple instructions our step-by-step guide provides clear instructions making it an enjoyable experience for crochet enthusiasts of all levels from beginners to experts everyone can create these charming additions to their home customization personalize your creations by choosing buttons that match your kitchen or bath theme from cute animals to intricate patterns the possibilities are endless perfect gift idea handmade items are the best gifts surprise your loved ones with a personalized touch for their kitchen or bathroom copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
